exceptions.exn: In environment q : R q' : Rabs q < 1 Hq : R_NormedModule -> Prop Unable to unify "Rabs ?M2363 < 1" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_NormedModule, ball (/ (1 - q)) eps y -> Hq y".
In environment q : R q' : Rabs q < 1 Hq : R_NormedModule -> Prop Unable to unify "R_NormedModule -> Prop" with "locally (/ (1 - q)) Hq -> filtermap (sum_n (fun n : nat => q ^ n)) eventually Hq".

original: intros q Hq. apply GP_infinite. apply Hq.
